squat 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    QTS Reorientation

    reorient_qts.Rd

    This function reorients the quaternions in a QTS for representing attitude with respect to the orientation of the sensor at the first time point.

    Usage

    reorient_qts(x, disable_normalization = FALSE)

    Arguments

    x

    An object of class qts.

    disable_normalization

    A boolean specifying whether quaternion normalization should be disabled. Defaults to FALSE.

    Value

    An object of class qts in which quaternions measure attitude with respect to the orientation of the sensor at the first time point.

    Examples

    reorient_qts(vespa64$igp[[1]])
#> # A tibble: 101 × 5
